Overview: 

The employees at the Russell Stover Chocolates (Russell Stover) Abilene, Kansas facility are strongly committed to employee, public, and environmental safety. This facility is operated to comply with all applicable federal, state, and local laws and is designed and operated in accordance with International Institute of Ammonia Refrigeration (IIAR) requirements.  In addition, Russell Stover operates this facility in accordance with internal standards that employ good engineering practice and industry accepted principles and codes. Russell Stover has instituted operating and training procedures that are designed to provide a safe work environment and protect our neighbors. 



The Russell Stover facility is a candy manufacturing operation.  It is comprised of one Risk Management Plan (RMP)-covered process involving anhydrous ammonia.  The facility maintains two separate ammonia refrigeration systems. All anhydrous ammonia is delivered to the facility by truck.  No other RMP regulated substances are handled at this facility. 



Emergency Action Plan: 

Russell Stover has developed an emergency action plan.  Russell Stover has an arrangement with the Abilene Fire Department to provide response in emergencies. The Fire Department is familiar with the Facility and the ammonia refrigeration systems.



Prevention Program: 

Our facility has taken all the necessary steps to comply with the accidental release prevention requirement set out under 40 CFR Part 68. This facility was designed and constructed in accordance with IIAR standards.  The elements of the release prevention program that are in place at our facility include Safety Information, Hazard Review, Operating Procedures, Training, Mechanical Integrity Program, Compliance Audits, and Incident Investigation 



Employees have been trained of the procedures associated with the processes and the Emergency Action Plan, and it is our policy to adhere to all applicable federal, state, and local regulations.

If an emergency were to occur, it is our policy to notify the Abilene Fire Department and any potentially affected neighbors. 



5-Year Accident History: 

No accidental releases have occurred at the Russell Stover Abilene Facility.



Planned changes to improve safety: 

We constantly review our ammonia refrigeration operations and procedures to improve safety. There are no current plans to change our current operation.
